com.ppm.integration.agilesdk.epic

Class PortfolioEpicIntegration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ppm.integration.agilesdk.epic.PortfolioEpicIntegration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FunctionIntegration

    public abstract class PortfolioEpicIntegration
extends java.lang.Object
implements FunctionIntegration
    Main class of Portfolio Epic integration point, used to push Portfolio Epic from PPM to the agile tool. Should be implemented by connector implementation.
    Since:
    PPM9.42

    • Method Detail

      • createEpicInAgileProject

        public abstract java.lang.String createEpicInAgileProject(PortfolioEpicCreationInfo epicInfo,
                                                          java.lang.String agileProjectValue,
                                                          ValueSet instanceConfigurationParameters)
        Create portfolio epic under the agile project(agile workspace) in an instance
        Parameters:
        epicInfo - the information of epic to create in the agile project
        agileProjectValue - the agile project information that was passed in the value of the AgileProject returned in IntegrationConnector.getAgileProjects(ValueSet).
        instanceConfigurationParameters - a value set which contains the configuration information of the instance
        Returns:
        the ID of the Epic in the agile tool.

      • getPortfolioEpicSyncInfo

        public abstract PortfolioEpicSyncInfo getPortfolioEpicSyncInfo(java.lang.String epicId,
                                                               java.lang.String agileProjectValue,
                                                               ValueSet instanceConfigurationParameters)
        Retrieve the Portfolio Epic information from the Agile Project to synchronize its information in PPM.
        Parameters:
        epicId - ID of the Epic in the Agile Tool
        agileProjectValue - the agile project information that was passed in the value of the AgileProject returned in IntegrationConnector.getAgileProjects(ValueSet).
        instanceConfigurationParameters - a value set which contains the configuration information of the instance
        Returns:
        the information on the Epic to sync to PPM (progress, Story Points sizing, etc.)

      • getEpicURI

        public abstract java.lang.String getEpicURI(java.lang.String epicId,
                                            java.lang.String agileProjectValue)
        Get the epic URI, which is used to generate a link to the epic in the Agile tool in PPM. You must NOT include the base URL of the connector in the returned value, just the part that should be added at the end of it.
        Parameters:
        epicId - epic id in the agile tool
        agileProjectValue - the agile project information that was passed in the value of the AgileProject returned in IntegrationConnector.getAgileProjects(ValueSet).
        Returns:
        epic URI part to append at the end of the agile tool base URL.
